property.name: Owner
property.tp:docstring: The uid of the tunnel owner, or -1 if it has no owner.

property.name: Group
property.tp:docstring: The gid of the tunnel group, or -1 if it has no owner.

property.name: NoPi
property.tp:docstring: The tunnel's "TUN_NO_PI" flag; true if no protocol info is prepended to the tunnel packets.

property.name: VnetHdr
property.tp:docstring: The tunnel's "TUN_VNET_HDR" flag; true if the tunnel packets include a virtio network header.

property.name: MultiQueue
property.tp:docstring: The tunnel's "TUN_TAP_MQ" flag; true if callers can connect to the tap device multiple times, for multiple send/receive queues.

arg.name: properties
arg.tp:docstring: A dictionary mapping property names to variant boxed values
